projectPurpose: To provide a high-performance, secure, and efficient reference implementation of a full node for the Kaspa network, written in the Rust programming language, improving upon the previous Go implementation and supporting various ecosystem tools.
mainFeatures: RPC interface (including wRPC) and CLI tools
Wallet functionality (supporting HD accounts, multiple accounts, instant transfers)
WASM compatibility for web/mobile browser support

marketPositioning: Rusty Kaspa positions itself as the high-performance, Rust-based reference implementation for the Kaspa network, offering significant technical advantages in efficiency, resource usage (via advanced pruning), and synchronization speed compared to other blockchain full nodes. Its focus on leveraging Rust and providing a robust foundation for the growing Kaspa ecosystem, including seamless integration with web and mobile applications via WASM, differentiates it within the broader landscape of blockchain node software. While not as widely recognized as foundational clients for larger networks like Bitcoin or Ethereum, it aims to be the technical standard-bearer for the Kaspa BlockDAG.
